You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesG G] > &gammad;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Gammad;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/03dc/index.htm U+003DC].
  * `&gammad;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/03dd/index.htm U+003DD].
